title: Death from Final Destination

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - After Night 2, you may attack a marked player. Their death will display as a "freak accident".

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When the game begins, about half players will be marked for death at random. You are told who is marked.
- Night 1, a random marked player will receive Powerful Defense for the night as well as a premonition stating *"You've received a premonition of a major accident involving these players: (list of marked players)"* along with another statement: *"Death (5469) has come for us all."*. These notifications cannot be blocked in any way.
- Night 2, if a marked player uses their ability that night. They are struck with an Astral Powerful attack. Players that die this way display that they died from a "major incident".
- Once all marked players die, you will leave town and town will receive the message: *"Death has reclaimed the lives of all survivors!"*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Reclaim the lives of those who should've died, and leave town.

desc:
Post 5469
*In Death there are no accidents, no coincidences, no mishaps and no escapes.*
